[quote=“spankjava, post:5, topic:226422”]to get the love symbol i use i typed love in a translator and got it im always ready to take ideas and putting them forwards so i shall post the updated when im done[/quote] I know you can use a translator. Also, how would that sig look with white BG?

item.title: Simplisity
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:4, topic:226422”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=297498.msg2391694#msg2391694 date=1218991803]

Japanese or Chinese character? Also, how do you tell which is what? I really want to know. The lines are a bit pixelated.

It’s the Japanese character for love.
IMO, you should have made the “love” a more brushed version of it, IE:
[ IMG ]http://www.shododesigns.com/art-love.gif[ /img]
The one you used is so pixely…

Also, it’s simplicity.
[/quote]You must know as you are leet, how do you tell the difference between Japanese and Chinese chars?[/quote]
they appear different. Its harder to tell with only one character, but if its a passage, you can tell if its chinese or japanese because some characters look really distinct.

Read full topic
